title: Jaylen Brown on heated exchange, physicality against the Pistons
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Celtics "We were just having fun, I think Stewart is a nice guy.
" Jaylen Brown and Isaiah Stewart both received technical fouls following their exchange (Charles Krupa/AP Photo).
The Celtics had their six-game win streak broken on Monday night in a 112-105 loss to the Pistons, but they didn’t go down without a fight, in multiple senses of the word.

title: Rob Reiner taught me how to see love as comedy
author: Meredith Goldstein
bullets: Love Letters Reiner, a legendary filmmaker, died on Sunday.
His romance films suggest that love may be inherently funny.
Writer-director Rob Reiner poses for a portrait, May 2, 2016, in New York.

title: Roomies were dealing meth out of their Brighton apartment, police say
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Both roommates have prior criminal records dating back to the '90s, according to the district attorney.
Two Brighton roommates were charged on Thursday with dealing meth out of their apartment, according to the Suffolk County District Attorney’s Office.
Vincenzo Porfino, 43, pleaded not guilty to trafficking methamphetamine of less than 100 grams.

title: Mass. man who allegedly threatened co-workers arrested with gun, drugs
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Dwayne Richardson has a criminal record for violent and drug-related crimes dating back to 1992.
A West Bridgewater man was arrested last week after allegedly brandishing a gun to his co-workers and threatening to kill them, the Suffolk County District Attorney announced Monday.
